alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Schuyler; Steuben; Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 3:39AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Schuyler, Chemung, northern Tioga, southeastern Steuben and southern Tompkins Counties through 415 AM EDT... At 338 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near South Danby to near Horseheads North to Painted Post. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elmira, Corning, Southport, Big Flats, Horseheads, Elmira Heights, Danby, Erin, Painted Post and Berkshire. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 44 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
